alert.note: Alert for Greene; Polk (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 6:10PM CDT until August 08 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Polk County in southwestern Missouri... Greene County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 610 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Walnut Grove, or 14 miles south of Bolivar, moving southeast at 15 mph. Additional severe storms were located over Greene County. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Springfield... Republic... Battlefield... Willard... Strafford... Ash Grove... Fair Grove... Walnut Grove... Morrisville... Brookline... Sacville... Glidewell... Ebenezer... Bassville... Brighton... Turners... Bois D`arc... Cave Springs... Eudora... Galloway... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 59 and 89. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
